## AudioDevice.select() method

Select the audio device as described by the data fields in this object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
select(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

- Resolves with `void` when the audio device has been successfully selected.
